description.value:
Frequency once per turn

You've replaced your heart with one made of animated quicksilver and living adamantine. You reduce your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed] condition by 1. Alternatively, if you are not slowed, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Quickened]{Quickened 1} during your next turn, and can use your extra action to Stride or Strike.
